name: Story Telling
description:
The idea behind this game is for a kids learning game, that teaches kids how to make up stories with random words and also learn how to say new words

Features:

  • 60 total different words
  • Each word has a pronounciation sound and possibly another sound depending if it makes one or if one was able to fit the item.
  • Cursor shop with 11 unique cursors (animated cursors don't work as well in WebGL as they do in the .exe) *note hidden button beside shop screen title to unlock all cursors*
  • Press P or Esc to access shop and settings menu

Thanks for checking out my game
